title: Politics
subtitle: Power, Sovereignty, and Governance: The Decentralized Political Experiment
introduction: Bitcoin is a profound political experiment. It challenges the state's monopoly on money, questions the necessity of central banks, and redefines economic sovereignty. In a decentralized network, there are no rulers, no central institutions, only consensus and algorithms. What does this new governance model mean for traditional political systems?

content.subtitle: Trustless Systems
points: Eliminating Single Points of Failure: Decentralization removes traditional system vulnerabilities
Code is Law: Rules enforced through algorithms rather than political decisions
BIP Process: Bitcoin Improvement Proposals democratize decision-making
Fork Mechanism: Communities can choose different development paths
